title: [$$] General Counsel Lucy Fato Leaves McGraw Hill Financial
text:
General Counsel Lucy Fato Leaves McGraw Hill Financial Company’s top lawyer led negotiations for Standard & Poor’s settlement with Justice Department, states By Timothy.Martin@wsj.com Updated Oct. 16, 2015 6:05 p.m. ET 
McGraw Hill Financial Inc. General Counsel Lucy Fato left this week after 14 months as the company’s top lawyer, according to people familiar with the matter. 
It is not yet known why she departed. Ms. Fato’s signature achievement was helping to resolve a raft of legal headaches for the firm’s Standard & Poor’s Ratings Services unit. 
A spokeswoman for McGraw Hill declined to comment, and Ms. Fato couldn't immediately be... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Popular on WSJ
